thread.section_title: School Stream - School Communication App Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of School Stream - School Communication App | schoolstream.com.au
thread.title: Deirdre
thread.title_full: School Stream - School Communication App reviewed by Deirdre

author: Deirdre
title: Deirdre
text: Fantastic App - Enables us to reach our school community quickly with important news and information. The App is very simple to use and if you require any assistance from support team it is also done in a timely manner.
